author: smorovic
body:
#### PR description:
Changes:
- DAQ modules: making some parameters tracked because they always need to be specified and updated by generated Python code in the online environment
- Cleanup: obsolete parameters in modules and test scripts, removal of obsolete scripts
- New unit test which runs startBU.py and startFU.py. This verifies that BU-FU file based protocol works correctly (using fake BU generator). DQM histogram and HLTRates pseudo-stream producers are added to the FU script.
- Removed separate adler32 check in DAQ service (for algorithm mostly obsolete except with very old raw files). Now the check is toggled using common veifyChecksum parameter
- adding DAQTestHistograms module for both unit tests and upcoming performance testing (will be able to produce enough histograms to emulate fastHadd CPU usage).

#### PR validation:
New unit test checks that parameter changes and new DQM test module execute correctly.
title: DAQ: updating module parameters and a new unit test
